root: ^How much do you know about the current affairs of the ghost world, human?
^Not much. My job is to keep them out of the living world, so what happens here isn’t much of my concern.
^Wrong. What happens here should very much concern you SPI members, if you want to keep the living world free of ghosts.
^Recent events have tipped the peace of our worlds, and warrant both the attention of the living and the dead.
^Have either of you heard of the “Ghost King”?
^I knew it was going to be about that bastard.
^…Ugh. I guess there’s no hiding it now. He’s the reason why I’m so weak.
^I see. So you are the ghost that lost to him in a fight and had your strength absorbed.
^I’m surprised you escaped him before he consumed you completely.
^It’s not like I meant for that to happen. If I had it my way, that miserable wretch would be dead twice over.
^Is this ‘Ghost King’ the one that’s posing a danger to both worlds?
^From what we’ve observed, he wants to cross into the living world and wreck it until it becomes his.
^To do that, he needs power — a lot of it. Which takes us to the [Crown Name].
^If he gets it, he’ll control all ghosts weaker than him to flood the living world.
^That is why I am concerned about how our possession of it became known to that Owlish ghost.
^I’m surprised you don’t use it yourself, given the immense power it grants you.
^Like I said, we serve to maintain the status quo between the living and the dead. That sort of control is in ill taste.
^Now that you are aware of this issue, I would like to request your partnership.
^Precisely. He is a threat to both worlds — I believe SPI would not like to see him crossing into the living world.
^I need someone to investigate him. Someone that he cannot absorb and will not fall under his control or influence.
^You just want a scapegoat, don’t you?
^If he discovers you trying to upset his bloodthirsty campaign, he’ll turn your eyes onto you and your crew.
^However, if it’s just some SPI member, then he wouldn’t catch onto you trying to undermine him.
^You’d walk scot-free while we take the fall. Ha.
^That’s… I will need to talk to my superiors to decide.
^Human, I don’t think you understand the position we’re in right now.
^How much time can we waste waiting for your little letters to travel back and forth while the Ghost King amasses power?
^What do you want us to do, Vincenzo?
^I won’t ask you to put yourselves in the line of fire of the Ghost King. We need time to investigate that owl-head.
^I will still need to inform SPI of this.
^That is fine. In fact, if they are willing to ally with us, that would be the best outcome.
^You may leave now. I will contact you when I have information.
